thread.title: USA Compression Partners to Buy Compression Business from Energy Transfer Partners

author: Cara Lombardo
title: USA Compression Partners to Buy Compression Business from Energy Transfer Partners

organizations.name: usa compression partners to buy compression business
energy transfer partners usa compression partners lp

text:
USA Compression Partners LP will buy Energy Transfer Partners LP’s compression business in a deal with a total transaction value of about $1.8 billion.
The deal will expand USA Compression’s geographic reach into several active basins including Eagle Ford Shale and Gulf Coast.
USA Compression’s compression unit produces, processes and transports...
